lines.text:
[takes out a notebook]
You might give me the names of all the other boys you know, that you go out with.
All of them? I hope you've got plenty of paper.
Well, I could believe there'd be a long list.
This isn't one of those tough cases which depends on clues.
[as Finch surreptitiously pockets a vital piece of evidence]
So after all that, what could I do? I just had to accept the mink coat.
